name: To Catch a Monkey
description: The test monkeys have escaped the lab! You must catch the furry fiends before the professor finds out. Chase them into traps with the tools you have at your disposal -- massive explosions and fiery death.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and Above Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1 ghz or equivalent Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB RAM Storage: 300 MB available space
